Cheesecake

RED VELVET CHEESECAKE

A stunning red velvet cheesecake with a protein-rich cream cheese filling.

24g
Protein
220
Calories
75m
Total Time
12
Yield

Nutrition per 1 slice

Carbs18g
Fat11g
Fiber2g
Sugar8g
DifficultyHard

INGREDIENTS

  • 240g cream cheese
  • 120g plain Greek yogurt
  • 60g vanilla whey protein
  • 2 large eggs
  • 2 tbsp unsweetened cocoa powder
  • 1 tbsp red food coloring

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Preheat Oven

Preheat your oven to 160¬∞C (325¬∞F).

2

Make Crust

Prepare a chocolate-flavored crust and press it into a springform pan.

3

Mix Filling

Beat cream cheese until smooth. Mix in Greek yogurt, whey protein, eggs, cocoa powder, and red food coloring.

4

Bake

Pour into the crust and bake for 55 minutes.

5

Cool

Cool completely before refrigerating.

6

Frost

Top with a protein cream cheese frosting before serving.

PRO TIPS

üí°

Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 5 days.

üí°

For best results, use a kitchen scale to measure ingredients in grams.

üí°

Let cool completely before storing to prevent sogginess.
